text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Mayo-Kebbi Ouest | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Chad 15 region locator map 2008-02.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Chad showing Mayo-Kebbi Ouest | mapsize = 200px | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Chad | subdivision_type1 = Departments | subdivision_name1 = 2 | subdivision_type2 = Sub-prefectures | subdivision_name2 = 8 | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Regional capital | seat = Pala | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 564470 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Mayo-Kebbi Ouest is one of the 23 regions of Chad. Its capital is Pala. The Mayo Kébbi river flows through the north of the region. Lake Léré and the smaller Lake Tréné are in the north-west.A directory of African wetlands ==Subdivisions== The region of Mayo-Kebbi Ouest is divided into two departments: Department Capital Sub-prefectures Mayo-Dallah Pala Gagal, Lamé, Pala, Torrock Lac Léré Binder, Guégou, Lagon, Léré ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
title: Mayo-Kebbi Ouest Region
